title: General FAQs
description: Everything you need to know about Chariot Claims and how it works.

items.title: What do I get when I sign up with Chariot Claims?
items.description: With Chariot Claims, you'll get your own agent to help you find, file and manage claims without any hassle. Plus, you'll always know about companies that are breaking the rules and get the compensation you're entitled to. Plus, our trusted law firm network ensures you have expert legal support every step of the way.
